name: ambience_current_playlist
description: Return the currently playing ambience playlist

name: ambience_current_track
description: Return the currently playing ambience track

name: ambience_history
description: Returns up to 100 of the last played tracks for a player

name: ambience_ls
description: List the contents of a subdirectory in the ambience directory

name: ambience_lsc
description: Enqueue a file or the contents of a subdirectory in the music directory

name: ambience_lsp
description: Play a file or the contents of a subdirectory in the ambience directory

name: ambience_skip
description: Skip the current ambience track

name: ambience_toggle
description: Toggle the playing of the ambience player

name: ambience_wc
description: Enqueue the web resource in the ambience player

name: ambience_wp
description: Play the web resource in the ambience player

name: clips_now
description: Schedule a clip to be played now

name: clips_toggle
description: Toggle the playing of clips

name: music_current_playlist
description: Return the currently playing music playlist

name: music_current_track
description: Return the currently playing music track

name: music_history
description: Returns the last music tracks played (max 100)

name: music_ls
description: List the contents of a subdirectory in the music directory

name: music_lsc
description: Enqueue a file or the contents of a subdirectory in the music directory

name: music_lsp
description: Play a file or the contents of a subdirectory in the music directory

name: music_playlist
description: Plays a playlist from available playlists. An int n input will play the nth playlist

name: music_playlists
description: Lists available playlists

name: music_skip
description: Skip the currently playing music track

name: music_toggle
description: Toggle the playing of the music player

name: music_wc
description: Enqueue the web resource in the music player

name: music_wp
description: Play the web resource in the music player
